long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Assists in automating tasks on Transvirtual.
Task #1 multiple consignment entry. 
Task #2 shows linehaul manifest numbers on linehaul controller.
Task #3 allows pickup/point to point to be checked with one click, also allows after invoice locking.
Task #4 automatically update drivers names on linehaul controller.
